img_source: Par Henry Vandyke Carter, CC0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 掃踢（Roundhouse Kick）與肘擊的力量來源。產生巨大的軀幹旋轉力矩，將力量傳遞至四肢。在纏鬥（Clinch）中抵抗對手的扭轉控制。
desc_en: Power source for Roundhouse Kicks and Elbows. Generates massive trunk rotational torque to transfer force to the limbs. Resists twisting control during the Clinch.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助精細的旋轉控制與防禦。在地面戰（Ground Game）的翻轉動作（Sweep）中至關重要，同時保護腹部臟器免受膝撞傷害。
desc_en: Assists in fine rotational control and defense. Crucial for sweeps in the ground game and protects abdominal organs from knee strikes.

img_source: Mongrangvebet, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 人體正面裝甲。必須極度強壯以承受泰拳的正蹬（Teep）與膝擊（Knee Strike）。在地面防守（Guard）中負責捲腹控制對手。
desc_en: Frontal body armor. Must be extremely strong to withstand Teeps and Knee Strikes. Responsible for crunching to control the opponent in the Guard.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 核心氣囊。透過繃緊（Bracing）增加腹內壓，在被摔倒（Takedown）著地瞬間保護脊椎，並在承受重擊時緩衝臟器震盪。
desc_en: Core airbag. Increases intra-abdominal pressure via bracing to protect the spine upon impact from takedowns and cushions organs against heavy strikes.

img_source: Bildbearbetning: sv:Användare:Chrizz, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 纏鬥與降伏的關鍵。在泰式箍頸（Plum）中負責拉下對手頭部，在MMA中則是執行裸絞（RNC）與斷頭台的主要肌肉。
desc_en: Key to clinching and submission. Responsible for pulling the opponent's head down in the Thai Plum and executing Rear Naked Chokes or Guillotines in MMA.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 長時間防禦架式（Guard）的支撐者。在持續的格鬥中維持手肘屈曲保護頭部，並在近身扭打中提供持續的抓握力量。
desc_en: Supporter of the prolonged Guard. Maintains elbow flexion to protect the head during sustained combat and provides continuous gripping power in close-quarters grappling.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責夾緊腋下防摔。在對手試圖穿過腋下抱摔（Underhook）時，負責將手臂夾緊軀幹進行防禦。
desc_en: Clamps the armpit for takedown defense. Adducts the arm tightly against the torso to defend against an opponent's underhook attempt.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 肘擊（Sok）的爆發力來源。在短距離內快速伸展手肘，產生如刀割般的肘擊力量，同時輔助直拳的穿透力。
desc_en: Explosive power for Elbow Strikes (Sok). Rapidly extends the elbow in close range to generate slashing elbow power, also assisting in straight punch penetration.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 纏鬥推擠（Framing）的關鍵。在箍頸或地面戰中，負責建立骨架空間（Frame）推開對手，防止被壓制。
desc_en: Key to Framing in grappling. Responsible for creating skeletal frames to push the opponent away and prevent suppression during clinches or ground fighting.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 提供持續的推力控制。在籠邊纏鬥（Cage Control）或地面壓制時，維持手臂伸直狀態以控制對手位置。
desc_en: Provides continuous pushing control. Maintains arm extension to control opponent position during cage wrestling or ground and pound.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防摔（Sprawl）的背部支柱。在防禦抱腿摔時負責強力伸展背部，防止被對手摺疊。在泰式箍頸中對抗對手拉頭的力量。
desc_en: Backbone of the Sprawl. Powerfully extends the back to prevent being folded during takedown defense. Resists head-pulling forces in the Thai Clinch.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 格鬥家的引擎。負責抱摔（Takedown）時的拉扯、箍頸中的控制，以及重拳的回收。強壯的背闊肌是頂級格鬥家的標配。
desc_en: The fighter's engine. Responsible for pulling in takedowns, controlling the clinch, and retracting heavy punches. Massive lats are standard for elite fighters.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 掃踢與膝擊的側向穩定器。在單腳站立攻擊時穩定骨盆，防止對側下墜。在地面防守（Guard）中協助臀部移動（Shrimping）。
desc_en: Lateral stabilizer for kicks and knees. Stabilizes the pelvis during single-leg attacks. Assists in hip escapes (shrimping) from the bottom Guard position.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 單腳支撐時的腳踝穩定器。在進行高掃踢或提膝擋腿（Checking）時，負責穩定支撐腳的外側平衡。
desc_en: Ankle stabilizer during single-leg support. Stabilizes the lateral balance of the planting foot during high kicks or checks.

name_zh: 腓骨長肌（重複項-請參照Peroneus Longus）
img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 轉腳（Pivot）的動力源。泰拳踢擊的威力來自支撐腳的旋轉，此肌肉負責壓低第一蹠骨，提供穩固的旋轉軸心。
desc_en: Source of Pivot power. Muay Thai kick power comes from pivoting the support foot; this muscle depresses the first metatarsal to provide a solid rotational axis.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 膝擊（Knee Strike）與突進的爆發力。像彈簧一樣負責格鬥步法中的節奏跳動（Bouncing），並在蹬地瞬間提供推力。
desc_en: Explosive power for Knee Strikes and dashes. Acts like a spring for the bouncing rhythm of combat stance and provides drive during push-off.

img_source: Polygon data is generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 格鬥站架（Stance）的耐力肌。格鬥家需長時間保持膝蓋微彎與腳跟離地，此肌肉確保在最後回合仍能維持靈活步法。
desc_en: Endurance muscle of the Stance. Fighters must maintain bent knees and raised heels for long periods; ensures agile footwork even in the final round.

img_source: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/d/df/Inferior_view_of_tibialis_posterior_muscle_-_animation.gif
desc: 足弓穩定器。在赤足格鬥（如泰拳、MMA）中，負責維持足弓剛性，確保蹬地力量能無損傳遞至踢擊或拳擊動作中。
desc_en: Arch stabilizer. In barefoot combat (Muay Thai, MMA), maintains arch rigidity to ensure ground push-off force is efficiently transferred to kicks or punches.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 側向支撐的微調器。在快速側閃或防守掃踢時，擴大足底外側支撐面，防止腳踝扭傷。
desc_en: Fine-tuner for lateral support. Widens the lateral plantar base during quick lateral slips or when defending kicks, preventing ankle sprains.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 赤足抓地的關鍵。在軟墊（Mat）或帆布上，負責大拇指的抓地力，提供旋轉踢擊時的穩固軸心。
desc_en: Key to barefoot grip. On mats or canvas, provides grip for the big toe, creating a solid axis for rotational kicks.

img_source: Image:Gray445.png modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 踢擊推進力的傳遞者。在後腳蹬地發動攻擊的瞬間，穩定大拇指與足弓，將地面反作用力轉化為動能。
desc_en: Transmitter of propulsion power. Stabilizes the big toe and arch at the moment of rear-foot push-off, converting ground reaction force into kinetic energy.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防止腳趾受傷。在快速移動中確保腳趾抬起，避免踢擊或移動時腳趾「吃蘿蔔」或擦傷軟墊。
desc_en: Prevents toe injury. Ensures toe clearance during rapid movement, avoiding stubbing or scraping toes against the mat during kicks or footwork.

img_source: Was a bee, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 步法靈活性的輔助。在複雜的格鬥步法（如換架 Switch）中，確保大拇指快速離地，避免絆倒。
desc_en: Aid for footwork agility. Ensures rapid big toe clearance during complex fighting footwork (like Switching stances), preventing tripping.

name_zh: 拇趾外展肌（內在肌視角）
img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 赤足格鬥的根基。控制大拇指外展以增加前腳掌接觸面積，對於單腳站立平衡（如踢擊、提膝）至關重要。
desc_en: Foundation of barefoot combat. Controls great toe abduction to increase forefoot contact area, vital for single-leg balance during kicks or checks.

img_source: Berichard, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 軟墊上的抓地力。在柔道墊或擂台帆布上，協助腳趾向下「扣住」地面，提供變向時的摩擦力。
desc_en: Grip on the mat. Helps toes 'claw' into the judo mat or ring canvas, providing traction for directional changes.

img_source: Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 蹠趾關節穩定器。在蹬地發力瞬間，防止腳趾過度捲曲，確保推進力道平穩傳遞。
desc_en: MTP joint stabilizer. Prevents excessive toe curling during push-off, ensuring smooth transmission of propulsion force.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 轉腳（Pivot）的關鍵肌肉。泰拳掃踢的威力源於支撐腳的旋轉，此肌肉負責壓低腳掌內側，確保旋轉時的抓地力與平衡。
desc_en: Key muscle for the Pivot. Muay Thai kick power comes from the rotation of the support foot; this muscle depresses the medial foot, ensuring grip and balance during the pivot.

img_source: Berichard d'après Gray's anatomy, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 修正腳趾拉力。在複雜的地面戰或立技移動中，確保腳趾能直線抓地，最大化抓地效率。
desc_en: Corrects toe pull. Ensures toes grip in a straight line during complex ground movements or stand-up footwork, maximizing grip efficiency.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 纏鬥中的拇指扣鎖。在MMA手套（Open finger）中，大拇指的活動度極高，此肌肉協助在抓握（Grip）時穩定拇指位置。
desc_en: Thumb lock in grappling. With open-finger MMA gloves, thumb mobility is high; this muscle stabilizes thumb position during gripping.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 裸絞（RNC）的關鍵肌。在執行絞技時，負責維持手肘的強力屈曲，將對手頸部鎖死。
desc_en: Key muscle for the Rear Naked Choke (RNC). Maintains powerful elbow flexion to lock down the opponent's neck during submission holds.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 手腕防護。在MMA小手套（4oz）中，手腕支撐較少，此肌肉需更強壯以防止擊打時手腕挫傷。
desc_en: Wrist protection. With small 4oz MMA gloves offering less support, this muscle must be stronger to prevent wrist buckling upon impact.

img_source: Me, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 重拳與地面控制的橋樑。在直拳擊打時鎖定手腕，在地面戰（Ground Control）中負責將手腕向後伸展以建立推擠空間（Framing）。
desc_en: Bridge for power punches and ground control. Locks the wrist during straight punches; responsible for extending the wrist to create frames in ground fighting.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防禦架式（Shell Guard）的加固者。負責穩定手腕尺側，在格擋掃踢（Kick Blocking）或重拳時防止手腕被震開。
desc_en: Reinforcer of the Shell Guard. Stabilizes the ulnar side of the wrist, preventing it from collapsing when blocking heavy kicks or punches.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 纏鬥中的手指控制。在需要快速張開手掌以轉換抓握點（Regripping）或推開對手頭部時發揮作用。
desc_en: Finger control in grappling. Active when rapidly opening the hand to regrip or push the opponent's head away.

img_source: Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在MMA中至關重要。負責張開手指以進行各種推擠（Framing）、支撐地面或在抓握失敗後快速重置手部位置。
desc_en: Crucial in MMA. Extends fingers for framing, posting on the mat, or rapidly resetting the hand after a failed grip attempt.

img_source: Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 地面戰中的精細控制。在尋找對手防守空隙或嘗試插入手指進行鎖技防禦（Hand Fighting）時提供獨立控制。
desc_en: Fine control in ground game. Provides independent control when seeking gaps in defense or hand fighting to defend against submissions.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防止拇指受傷。在開放式手指手套（MMA Gloves）中，此肌肉協助維持拇指穩定，防止在纏鬥混亂中拇指被折傷。
desc_en: Prevents thumb injury. In open-finger MMA gloves, helps stabilize the thumb, preventing it from being hyperextended during chaotic grappling scrambles.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 抓握把手（Grip Fighting）的工具。在柔術或纏鬥中，負責張開拇指以建立新的抓握點，或是從對手的控制中掙脫。
desc_en: Tool for Grip Fighting. In Jiu-Jitsu or grappling, extends the thumb to establish new grips or strip the opponent's control.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 箍頸（Clinch）的動力來源。負責強力屈腕以扣住對手頸部，將對手頭部下壓（Breaking Posture），是泰拳手必備的強壯肌肉。
desc_en: Power source for the Clinch. Flexes the wrist forcefully to cup the opponent's neck and break their posture; a must-have muscle for Muay Thai fighters.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 手腕鎖定肌。在擺拳（Hook）擊打時承受反作用力，並在柔術中協助維持「猴爪（Monkey Grip）」的穩定性。
desc_en: Wrist locking muscle. Absorbs reaction forces during hooks and assists in maintaining 'Monkey Grip' stability in Jiu-Jitsu.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 「死亡之扣」的來源。在MMA或泰拳中負責抓握對手的手腕、頸部或腳踝。指尖的抓握力直接決定了控制對手的能力。
desc_en: Source of the 'Death Grip'. Responsible for gripping the opponent's wrist, neck, or ankle in MMA/Muay Thai. Fingertip grip strength dictates control capability.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 長時間抓握的耐力肌。在籠邊纏鬥或地面壓制時，提供持續性的抓握力量，防止對手掙脫。
desc_en: Endurance muscle for sustained gripping. Provides continuous holding power during cage wrestling or ground control, preventing opponent escape.

img_source: Me, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 鎖定抓握（Grip Lock）。在抓握對手手腕（Wrist Control）時，負責將大拇指扣緊，形成完整的封閉環，讓對手難以掙脫。
desc_en: Grip Lock. When establishing wrist control, locks the thumb down to form a complete closed loop, making it difficult for the opponent to strip the grip.

img_source: Henry Gray, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 抓握時的手掌張力。在裸絞（RNC）扣合瞬間，協助屈腕並拉緊掌腱膜，增加絞技的緊實度。
desc_en: Palm tension during gripping. Assists in wrist flexion and tenses the palmar aponeurosis when locking in a Rear Naked Choke, increasing the tightness of the strangle.

img_source: Selket at English Wikipedia, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 出拳穿透力與防禦。在直拳最後階段旋前前臂增加穿透力。在地面防禦手部鎖技（如木村鎖）時，對抗對手的外旋力量。
desc_en: Punch penetration and defense. Pronates forearm at impact for straight punches. Resists opponent's external rotation force when defending armlocks (e.g., Kimura) on the ground.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 擺拳（Overhand）的旋轉肌。將手臂像鞭子一樣甩出並旋前拳頭。在纏鬥中，協助將對手手臂向內扭轉以破壞其重心。
desc_en: Rotator for the Overhand. Whips the arm and pronates the fist. In grappling, helps twist the opponent's arm inward to disrupt their balance.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防禦十字固（Armbar）的救命肌。當對手嘗試伸直你的手臂時，負責將手臂旋後（轉動拇指方向）以改變肘關節角度，爭取逃脫機會。
desc_en: Lifesaver against Armbars. When an opponent tries to extend your arm, supinates the arm (turning the thumb) to change the elbow angle and create an escape window.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 手刀（Knife Hand）打擊的基石。在執行手刀劈擊或格擋時，負責繃緊手掌外緣肌肉。
desc_en: Foundation of the Knife Hand strike. Tenses the ulnar border of the hand when executing chops or blocks.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 地面支撐（Posting）。在地面戰中需要用手掌撐地以維持平衡或起身時，協助大拇指展開以擴大支撐面積。
desc_en: Posting on the mat. When posting the hand for balance or get-ups in ground fighting, spreads the thumb to maximize the base of support.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 猴爪（Monkey Grip）的核心。在不需要大拇指扣鎖的抓握中（如引體向上式控制），負責提供強大的側向夾持力。
desc_en: Core of the Monkey Grip. Provides powerful lateral pinching force in thumbless grips (like pull-up style control) used in grappling.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 控制對手頭部。在進行抓頭（Palm Control）時，負責張開手指以覆蓋對手頭部最大面積，施加控制力。
desc_en: Head control. Spreads fingers to cover the maximum surface area of the opponent's head when applying palm control.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 地面戰的支撐穩定。在用手掌推地（Posting）或推開對手時，協助穩定手指結構，防止手指過度伸展受傷。
desc_en: Support stability in ground game. Stabilizes finger structure when posting or framing against an opponent, preventing hyperextension injuries.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助張手防禦。在阻擋對手視線（Posting on face）或進行手部防守戰（Hand Fighting）時維持手掌張力。
desc_en: Assists open-hand defense. Maintains palm tension when posting on the face to obstruct vision or during hand fighting.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 強化抓握寬度。在抓握大物體（如對手的大腿或身體）時，協助小指向外擴張以獲得更好的抓握角度。
desc_en: Enhances grip width. Assists in splaying the little finger to achieve a better angle when gripping large objects like the opponent's thigh or body.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 手掌邊緣的控制力。在抓握對手手腕（Wrist Grip）時，負責鎖緊手掌下緣，防止對手滑脫。
desc_en: Ulnar edge control. Tightens the lower edge of the palm when securing a wrist grip, preventing the opponent from slipping out.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 強化抓握鎖定。在MMA手套中，提供拇指強大的屈曲力量，用於扣住對手的四肢或在地面戰中控制位置。
desc_en: Enhances grip lock. Provides strong thumb flexion in MMA gloves, used for locking onto opponents' limbs or controlling position in ground fighting.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 勾狀抓握（Hook Grip）。在不依賴拇指的情況下，協助手指形成勾狀以勾住對手頸部或關節。
desc_en: Hook Grip. Assists fingers in forming a hook shape to latch onto the opponent's neck or joints without relying on the thumb.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助維持拳鋒角度。在裸拳或薄手套擊打時，確保掌指關節突出，減少手指受傷風險。
desc_en: Maintains knuckle alignment. Ensures MCP joint prominence during bare-knuckle or thin-glove striking, reducing finger injury risk.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 增強抓握的適應性。在抓握不規則物體（如對手的手腕或腳踝）時，協助手指適應形狀。
desc_en: Enhances grip adaptability. Assists fingers in conforming to irregular shapes (like an opponent's wrist or ankle) during gripping.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防止手掌被撐開。在對手試圖剝離你的抓握（Grip Stripping）時，協助維持手指的勾狀結構。
desc_en: Prevents grip opening. Helps maintain the hook structure of the fingers when an opponent attempts to strip your grip.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 手掌杯狀結構（Cupping）。在箍頸時，協助手掌形成杯狀以更緊密地貼合對手後腦杓。
desc_en: Palm Cupping. Assists in forming a cup shape with the palm to tightly fit the back of the opponent's head during the clinch.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 封閉式抓握（Closed Grip）的關鍵。在柔術道服抓握（Gi Grip）或控制手腕時，將拇指對掌以鎖死抓握環。
desc_en: Key to Closed Grip. Opposes the thumb to lock the grip loop when securing Gi grips or wrist control in grappling.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 手刀（Knife Hand）的結構強化。負責內收食指，使手掌邊緣緊實，適用於手刀劈擊或穿刺攻擊（Spear Hand）。
desc_en: Reinforcement for Knife Hand. Adducts the index finger to tighten the hand's edge, suitable for chop strikes or spear hand attacks.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防止手指散開。在穿戴MMA分指手套時，協助手指併攏，避免在出拳時手指插到對手眼睛（Eye Poke）或受傷。
desc_en: Prevents finger splaying. In MMA gloves, helps keep fingers together to avoid accidental eye pokes or finger injuries during punches.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 緊實拳頭。負責收緊手掌尺側縫隙，確保拳頭是一個紮實的整體，減少擊打時的能量耗損。
desc_en: Compacts the fist. Closes gaps on the ulnar side of the palm, ensuring the fist is a solid unit to minimize energy loss upon impact.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 握力強化的輔助。在極限用力的抓握（如抓握道服 Gi Grip 或手腕）時收縮，保護尺神經血管束。
desc_en: Grip reinforcement aid. Contracts during maximal gripping (like Gi Grip or wrist control) to protect the ulnar neurovascular bundle.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防震機制。在預期頭部受擊時咬緊牙套（Mouthguard），固定下顎以減少腦震盪風險與下巴骨折機率。
desc_en: Shock protection mechanism. Clenches the mouthguard when anticipating head impact, stabilizing the jaw to reduce concussion risk and jaw fracture.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 下顎側向穩定。在遭受勾拳（Hook）擊打下巴側面時，協助穩定下顎，防止過度位移造成的關節傷害。
desc_en: Lateral jaw stability. Helps stabilize the mandible when taking a hook to the side of the chin, preventing joint injury from excessive displacement.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 收下巴（Chin Tuck）的輔助。協助閉口並後縮下顎，將下巴藏在肩膀後方，保護格鬥家的「開關」。
desc_en: Chin Tuck aid. Assists in closing and retracting the jaw, keeping the chin tucked behind the shoulder to protect the fighter's 'button'.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 封閉式防守（Closed Guard）的力量。在地面戰中負責夾緊雙腿控制對手軀幹，限制其行動與打擊空間。
desc_en: Power of the Closed Guard. Provides the squeezing force to control the opponent's torso with the legs in ground fighting, limiting their movement and striking space.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 格鬥最強引擎。負責防摔（Sprawl）的強力下壓、起橋（Bridging）逃脫、以及重拳與踢擊的發力核心。
desc_en: The strongest combat engine. Responsible for the powerful hip drive in Sprawls, Bridging escapes, and generating core power for heavy punches and kicks.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 踢擊的基石。在單腳支撐進行掃踢或提膝時，負責穩定骨盆。若此肌肉無力，踢擊將失去平衡與穿透力。
desc_en: Cornerstone of kicking. Stabilizes the pelvis during single-leg kicks or checks. Weakness here results in loss of balance and penetration power in kicks.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 轉身動作的穩定器。在轉身鞭拳（Spinning Backfist）或後踢時，將股骨頭鎖定在髖臼中，確保旋轉軸心穩定。
desc_en: Spinning move stabilizer. Locks the femoral head in the socket during Spinning Backfists or Back Kicks, ensuring a stable axis of rotation.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 高掃踢（High Kick）的控制肌。協助大腿內收與屈曲，其柔韌性直接影響高段踢擊的流暢度與高度。
desc_en: High Kick control muscle. Assists in thigh adduction and flexion; its flexibility directly impacts the fluidity and height of head kicks.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 正蹬（Teep）的啟動者。負責快速屈髖將膝蓋提起，是泰拳控制距離最重要的前置動作。
desc_en: Initiator of the Teep. Responsible for rapid hip flexion to lift the knee, the most critical preparatory motion for controlling distance in Muay Thai.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 膝擊（Khao）的發動機。負責將大腿猛力向上拉向軀幹，產生毀滅性的膝撞力量。同時也是地面防守恢復（Guard Retention）的關鍵。
desc_en: Engine of the Knee Strike (Khao). Forcefully pulls the thigh toward the trunk to generate devastating knee impact. Also key for Guard Retention in ground game.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防禦三角絞（Triangle Choke）。在地面戰中，協助穩定髖關節對抗對手的腿部絞殺壓力。
desc_en: Triangle Choke defense aid. Helps stabilize the hip joint against the squeezing pressure of the opponent's legs during ground fighting.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 踢擊轉髖的輔助。協助臀部外旋肌群，在掃踢時將髖部完全打開（Open hips），增加打擊範圍與力量。
desc_en: Kick rotation aid. Assists external rotators in fully opening the hips during roundhouse kicks, increasing range and power.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 纏鬥中的大腿夾持。在騎乘位（Mount）或背後控制（Back Mount）時，負責大腿內收以保持對對手的緊密控制。
desc_en: Thigh clamping in grappling. Responsible for adduction to maintain tight control over the opponent during Mount or Back Mount positions.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 掃踢（Roundhouse Kick）的轉軸。在支撐腿進行大角度外旋（Pivot）時提供關鍵穩定性，讓身體能如鞭子般甩出踢擊。
desc_en: Axis of the Roundhouse Kick. Provides critical stability during the deep external rotation (pivot) of the support leg, allowing the body to whip into the kick.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 地面防守（Guard）的控制塔。在地面戰中負責抬腿與控制距離，防止對手輕易過腿（Pass Guard）。
desc_en: Control tower of the Guard. Responsible for lifting legs and controlling distance in ground fighting, preventing the opponent from easily passing the guard.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 地面戰的髖部微調。在複雜的柔術位置轉換中，協助穩定髖關節的外旋位置。
desc_en: Hip fine-tuning in ground game. Assists in stabilizing hip external rotation during complex Jiu-Jitsu transitions.

img_source: colorized by Michael Gasperl, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 側踢（Side Kick）的輔助。協助屈髖與外展，將腿部抬起至側向攻擊位置。同時在單腳站立時穩定膝蓋外側。
desc_en: Side Kick aid. Assists in hip flexion and abduction to lift the leg into a lateral striking position. Also stabilizes the lateral knee during single-leg stance.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 步法靈活性的關鍵。負責解鎖膝關節（Unlock），使格鬥家能從僵硬站姿瞬間切換到移動或攻擊狀態。
desc_en: Key to footwork agility. Unlocks the knee joint, allowing the fighter to instantly switch from a static stance to movement or attack.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 抵抗頸部絞技。在對手嘗試裸絞或斷頭台時，協助屈曲頸部與保護氣管，爭取防禦時間。
desc_en: Resistance against neck chokes. Assists in neck flexion and tracheal protection when defending against Rear Naked Chokes or Guillotines.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 遭受上勾拳（Uppercut）後的穩定。協助穩定舌骨與下顎，減輕下巴被向上重擊後的震盪影響。
desc_en: Stability after Uppercuts. Helps stabilize the hyoid and mandible, mitigating the shock effects after a heavy upward strike to the chin.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防禦姿態的核心。負責維持「收下巴（Chin Tuck）」姿勢，隱藏要害，防止被擊中下巴尖端導致KO。
desc_en: Core of the defensive posture. Maintains the 'Chin Tuck' position, hiding the vulnerable jaw button to prevent knockouts.

img_source: User:Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 口腔防護。在咬緊牙套時提供口腔底部的肌肉張力，保護舌頭與下顎結構免受衝擊傷害。
desc_en: Oral protection. Provides muscle tension to the floor of the mouth when clenching the mouthguard, protecting the tongue and jaw structure from impact.

img_source: Berichard, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 連結肩頸防禦。在聳肩防禦（Shoulder Roll）時，協助穩定頸部前側筋膜，保護血管與神經。
desc_en: Links shoulder and neck defense. Stabilizes anterior cervical fascia during shoulder rolls, protecting vessels and nerves.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 抵抗泰式箍頸（Thai Clinch/Plum）的防線。當對手試圖壓低你的頭部（Neck Wrestling）時，此肌肉負責頑強抵抗，保持視線與平衡。
desc_en: Defense against the Thai Clinch (Plum). When an opponent tries to pull your head down (Neck Wrestling), this muscle resists tenaciously to maintain vision and posture.

img_source: User:Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 氣管盾牌。覆蓋在氣管前方，在遭受正面擊打或被前臂壓迫喉嚨（Choke defense）時提供一層肌肉保護。
desc_en: Trachea shield. Covers the front of the trachea, providing a muscular layer of protection against frontal strikes or forearm pressure on the throat.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 核心壓力的底座。在被摔（Slammed）或承受重擊時，與橫隔膜協同收縮以維持腹內壓，保護脊椎與內臟。
desc_en: Base of core pressure. Contracts synergistically with the diaphragm to maintain intra-abdominal pressure when being slammed or taking a hit, protecting spine and organs.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 膝擊與勾腿（Hooking）的主力。在箍頸膝撞時負責屈膝發力。在地面戰中，負責腿部彎曲扣住對手（Leg Curl）以進行降伏或翻轉。
desc_en: Primary muscle for knee strikes and hooking. Powers knee flexion during clinch knees. In ground game, performs leg curls to hook opponents for submissions or sweeps.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 踢擊的煞車系統。在快速彈腿（Snap Kick）或踢擊落空時，負責減速小腿，防止膝關節過度伸展受傷。
desc_en: Braking system for kicks. Decelerates the lower leg during snap kicks or missed kicks (whiffing), preventing knee hyperextension injuries.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 泰拳手的「鋼盾」。負責執行泰拳最重要的防禦動作——「提膝擋腿（Checking kicks）」。強壯的脛前肌能保護脛骨，在與對手掃踢硬碰硬時提供肌肉緩衝。
desc_en: The Nak Muay's 'steel shield'. Executes the most vital defense in Muay Thai: 'Checking kicks'. A strong tibialis anterior protects the tibia and cushions the impact when clashing with an opponent's roundhouse kick.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 維持「長手防禦（Long Guard）」的關鍵。泰拳手常需長時間前伸雙臂以控制距離或干擾視線，此肌肉需具備極高耐力。
desc_en: Key to maintaining the 'Long Guard'. Muay Thai fighters often keep arms extended for long periods to control distance or obstruct vision, requiring immense endurance here.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 箍頸（Clinch）中的擴張架構。協助抬起手肘以破壞對手的箍頸控制，或在地面戰中打開手臂保持平衡。
desc_en: Expansion frame in the Clinch. Helps lift elbows to break opponent's clinch control, or spreads arms for balance in ground fighting.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 轉身鞭拳（Spinning Backfist）與肘擊的動力。負責手臂的水平外展與後拉，產生強大的旋轉打擊力量。
desc_en: Power for Spinning Backfists and Elbows. Responsible for horizontal abduction and retraction of the arm, generating powerful rotational strike force.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 打擊煞車片。在重拳揮空（Whiffing）時，承受巨大的離心力以保護肩關節。在地面戰中協助手臂外旋以防禦木村鎖（Kimura）。
desc_en: Striking brake pad. Absorbs immense eccentric force when a punch misses, protecting the shoulder. Assists in external rotation to defend against Kimura locks on the ground.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 聳肩防禦（Shoulder Roll）。在近身格鬥中，負責抬高肩膀以保護下巴，偏轉對手的勾拳攻擊。
desc_en: Shoulder Roll defense. In close-range combat, lifts the shoulder to protect the chin and deflect incoming hook punches.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防禦美式鎖（Americana）。作為強大的內旋肌，在地面戰中抵抗對手將手臂強行外旋的降伏企圖。
desc_en: Americana defense. As a powerful internal rotator, resists the opponent's attempts to forcefully externally rotate the arm during submission attacks on the ground.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 手臂抬舉的啟動者。在長時間維持高防禦架式（High Guard）或進行連續擺拳攻擊時，容易因疲勞而受傷。
desc_en: Arm lift initiator. Prone to fatigue and injury when maintaining a High Guard for extended periods or executing continuous hook attacks.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 纏鬥中的下拉力量。協助背闊肌在泰式箍頸中將對手頭部向下拉，或在地面戰中執行手臂拖拉（Arm Drag）。
desc_en: Pull-down power in grappling. Assists the lats in pulling the opponent's head down in the Thai Clinch or executing Arm Drags in ground fighting.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 肩關節後方穩定。在頻繁的打擊與纏鬥中，保護肩關節後囊，防止脫臼。
desc_en: Posterior shoulder stability. Protects the posterior joint capsule during frequent striking and grappling, preventing dislocation.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 出拳的根基。在重拳擊打時負責下壓與固定肩胛骨，確保力量從核心順暢傳遞至手臂，防止肩膀聳起分散力量。
desc_en: Foundation of the punch. Depresses and anchors the scapula during heavy strikes, ensuring power transfers smoothly from core to arm without energy-leaking shrugs.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防摔（Sprawl）的背部鎖定。在防禦抱腿摔時，協助將肩胛骨後收夾緊，增強上半身的整體剛性。
desc_en: Back lock for Sprawling. Assists in retracting the scapulae during takedown defense, enhancing overall upper body rigidity.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 頸部護盾。極度發達的上斜方肌能保護頸椎免受摔技傷害，並填補頸部與肩膀的空隙，減少被絞技（Choke）鎖死的空間。
desc_en: Neck shield. Hypertrophied upper traps protect the cervical spine from slam injuries and fill the gap between neck and shoulder, reducing space for chokes to sink in.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 地面戰與纏鬥的關鍵。在綜合格鬥（MMA）中負責「封閉式防守（Closed Guard）」的夾腿力量，或在柔術中控制對手軀幹。站立技中輔助高掃踢。
desc_en: Critical for ground game and grappling. Provides the squeezing power for 'Closed Guard' in MMA/BJJ to control the opponent's torso. Assists in high kicks during striking.

img_source: Berichard, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 高掃踢（High Kick）的隱藏推手。除了穩定骨盆，在大幅度踢擊時提供必要的髖伸展力量，並在踢擊回收時協助快速夾腿回防。
desc_en: Hidden driver of the High Kick. Besides pelvic stability, provides hip extension power during high kicks and assists in rapidly adducting the leg to return to stance.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 膝蓋內側穩定器。在進行三角鎖（Triangle Choke）時，負責大腿的緊密夾持。在站立時防止被踢擊導致膝外翻。
desc_en: Medial knee stabilizer. Provides tight thigh clamping during Triangle Chokes. Prevents knee valgus when taking leg kicks in stance.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 腿部攻擊的主力。負責踢擊（Kicking）時的快速伸膝與屈髖動作，如正蹬（Teep）或高掃踢。同時在防摔（Sprawl）後負責快速起身。
desc_en: Primary weapon for leg attacks. Responsible for rapid knee extension and hip flexion during kicks, such as teeps or high kicks. Also crucial for exploding back up after a sprawl.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 提膝擋腿（Check）的完美肌肉。其功能（屈髖+屈膝+外旋）正好對應提膝擋腿的動作路徑。在地面戰中協助三角鎖的腿部調整。
desc_en: Perfect muscle for Checking. Its function (hip flexion + knee flexion + external rotation) perfectly matches the motion of checking a kick. Assists in adjusting legs for Triangle Chokes on the ground.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 深層踢擊力量。作為純粹的膝伸展肌，為正蹬（Teep）與掃踢提供強大的基礎推力。
desc_en: Deep kicking power. As a pure knee extensor, provides the foundational thrust for Teeps and Roundhouse kicks.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防摔與突進的驅動器。提供強大的伸膝力量，用於雙腿抱摔（Double Leg）的衝刺或防摔時的支撐。
desc_en: Driver for takedowns and dashes. Provides powerful knee extension for the drive in Double Leg takedowns or support during sprawl defense.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 膝蓋保護者。在正蹬（Teep）腿部完全伸直鎖定時，負責穩定髕骨，防止過度伸展受傷。
desc_en: Knee protector. Stabilizes the patella when the leg is fully extended and locked during a Teep, preventing hyperextension injury.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 核心氣壓閥。格鬥家在出拳或受擊瞬間的短促吐氣（"Shh"聲），即是透過橫隔膜收縮增加腹內壓，硬化核心以傳遞力量或抗擊打。
desc_en: Core pressure valve. The sharp exhale ("Shh") during strikes or impact utilizes the diaphragm to spike intra-abdominal pressure, stiffening the core for power transfer or impact absorption.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 軀幹防禦盔甲。在格鬥中，身體兩側常暴露於膝撞與掃踢（Body Kick）之下，緊縮的肋間肌能像盔甲般保護肋骨與內臟。
desc_en: Torso armor. In combat, the flanks are exposed to knees and body kicks; tight intercostal muscles act like armor to protect ribs and organs.

img_source: DrJanaOfficial, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 勾拳與纏鬥擠壓。負責勾拳（Hook）的發力，並在纏鬥中用力夾緊手肘（Squeeze）以控制對手位置或防禦降伏。
desc_en: Hooks and grappling squeeze. Powers hook punches and forcefully squeezes elbows in clinches to control opponent position or defend against submissions.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 圓背防守（Shelling）。協助將肩胛骨前傾，使身體縮成一團，減少被攻擊面積，保護重要器官。
desc_en: Shelling defense. Assists in tilting the scapula anteriorly to curl the body into a compact ball, minimizing target area and protecting vital organs.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 拳擊手肌肉。負責將肩胛骨前伸（Protraction），增加出拳距離（Reach），並在出拳接觸瞬間鎖定肩胛骨以傳遞核心力量。
desc_en: The Boxer's Muscle. Protracts the scapula to increase punch reach and locks the scapula at impact to transfer core power.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 鎖骨穩定器。在重拳擊中目標或被摔倒肩部著地時，保護胸鎖關節（SC Joint）免受衝擊傷害。
desc_en: Clavicle stabilizer. Protects the sternoclavicular (SC) joint from shock injury when landing heavy punches or when landing on the shoulder during a takedown.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 胸壁加固。位於胸骨後方，在遭受正蹬（Teep）或膝撞擊中胸口時，協助維持胸廓結構完整。
desc_en: Chest wall reinforcement. Located behind the sternum, assists in maintaining thoracic structural integrity when taking a Teep or Knee strike to the chest.
